quote: Baz arched an elegant brow. ""Are you going to snog the Humdrum-is that your plan? Because he's eleven. And he looks just like you. That's both vain and deviant, Snow, even for you.
quote_letters: BAZ ARCHED AN ELEGANT BROW ARE YOU GOING TO SNOG THE HUMDRUM-IS THAT YOUR PLAN BECAUSE HES ELEVEN AND HE LOOKS JUST LIKE YOU THATS BOTH VAIN AND DEVIANT SNOW EVEN FOR YOU
